Phase 1: Repository Setup & Skeleton

- Created monorepo structure: frontend/, backend/, specs/
- Added .gitignore with comprehensive exclusions
- Created environment example files for frontend and backend
- Defined dependencies: package.json and requirements.txt
- Added comprehensive README with setup instructions
- Included setup automation scripts \(quick-start.bat, etc.\)
- Added specification and planning documents
- Included Claude Code agents and skills configuration

Repository structure ready for Phase 2 implementation.

\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 5: Frontend Task UI Complete

Completed all frontend task management pages per specification:

Task Pages \(User Stories 2-7\):
- Created /tasks page - Main task list view \(US2\)
- Created /tasks/new page - Create new task form \(US3\)
- Created /tasks/[id] page - Task detail view \(US4\)
- Created /tasks/[id]/edit page - Edit task form \(US5\)
- All pages include delete functionality \(US6\)
- All pages support toggle completion \(US7\)

Route Structure:
- Organized under \(protected\) route group
- Proper authentication guards on all pages
- Navigation between pages with back buttons
- Error handling and loading states

Features:
- Full CRUD operations for tasks
- JWT authentication on all requests
- User data isolation enforced
- Responsive UI with Tailwind CSS
- Form validation and error messages
- Confirmation dialogs for destructive actions

All 7 user stories from specification now fully implemented.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 6: Final Polish & Documentation Complete

Documentation:
- Created comprehensive backend/README.md with API docs, setup, testing
- Created comprehensive frontend/README.md with components, routes, setup
- Updated root README.md with Phase 2 status and complete structure
- Created TESTING.md with detailed smoke test checklist \(100+ tests\)

Validation \(Already Implemented\):
- Backend: Pydantic schemas with Field validators \(min_length, max_length\)
  - Title: 1-255 chars required
  - Description: 0-1000 chars optional
- Frontend: HTML5 validation + character limits
  - Title: required, maxLength 255
  - Description: maxLength 1000
  - Character counters displayed

Error Logging \(Already Implemented\):
- Structured logging with timestamps in backend/app/main.py
- Log levels: INFO \(production\), DEBUG \(development\)
- Error handlers for validation, integrity, and general exceptions

Testing:
- Backend: 55 passing tests \(security, auth, CRUD\)
- Frontend: Manual smoke test checklist created
- Edge cases covered: session expiration, network failures, user isolation

All Phase 6 tasks complete. Application ready for production deployment.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
